content: yarn k to last 2 sts kfb k1 2 sts increased repeat row 1 2 purling into next selvage st across sixth stripe top until st count is same as st count of first stripe repeat fourth stripe with red yarn break yarn but do stripe not move sts onto holder at the end row 1 rs sl1 wyif k to last st sl1 wyif p1 into next first two arrow stripes selvage st then psso row 2 ws sl1 knitwise wyib kfb k to last 2 sts k2tog transfer held sts onto needle so all live sts are on repeat row 1 2 until last p1 was into last selvage st needle with point in sixth stripe sts to begin a rs completing the following row 2 row st count on needle is stripe st count × 6 progress by lee meredith leedoesstuff com page 5 setup row rs sl1 wyif move with brown yarn work row 2 stitch count of garter ridges in red tail to back and join black then repeat row 1 2 for the first six stripes each arrow stripe yarn k to last st of stripe same number of row as the 6 sts 2 ridges 4 row k2tog working the two black stripe again stopping 8 sts 2 ridges 4 row different colored sts decrease five after ws row break yarn 10 sts 3 ridges 6 row times k to last st sl1 wyif 12 sts 4 ridges 8 row 5 sts decreased triangle stripes 14 sts 5 ridges 10 row 16 sts 6 ridges 12 row switch to light blue yarn middle st is the st which was 18 sts 7 ridges 14 row row 1 rs sl1 wyif k to last k2tog worked with third and 20 sts 8 ridges 16 row st sl1 wyif fourth stripe colors place a 22 sts 9 ridges 18 row row 2 ws k2tog k to 1 st locking marker on this st on 24 sts 10 ridges 20 row before middle st cdd k to last the ws and move the marker 26 sts 11 ridges 22 row 2 sts ssk 4 sts decreased up closer to the edge after 28 sts 12 ridges 24 row repeat row 1 2 until the table every several row worked 30 sts 13 ridges 26 row number of ridges have been row 1 ws kfb k to 1 st worked in blue break yarn before middle st cdd k to last whenever you re told to sl1 wyif but with light pink yarn repeat 2 sts kfb k1 the yarn has been cut and you re joining row 1 2 for same number row 2 rs sl1 wyif k to last a new yarn slip the st then move tail of row as previous stripes st sl1 wyif through needles to the back and join break yarn repeat row 1 2 stopping new yarn for the first knit st you may after a row 1 ws when
